data.title: Tim Tebow Foundation
data.text:
Hosted every year by churches on the Friday before Valentine's Day, each Night to Shine event is unique to its location, but some cornerstone activities included across all of them are a red carpet complete with a warm welcome from a friendly crowd and paparazzi, hair and makeup stations, shoeshines, limousine rides, karaoke, gifts, a catered dinner, a Sensory Room, a Respite Room for parents and caregivers, dancing, and a crowning ceremony where every guest is honored as a King or Queen â the way God sees them each and every day.

We would love to be able to bring Night to Shine to as many towns, cities and countries as possible!

If you are a pastor or on staff at a church and are interested in having your church serve as a host in your city, please click HERE to learn more about how to become an official Night to Shine host church.

If you attend a church or know of a church in your community that may be interested in serving as a host church, we encourage you to share about Night to Shine with them! You can also refer them HERE and we will share more information with the church directly about hosting Night to Shine.

We want you to experience Night to Shine no matter where you are! Our hope is to have Night to Shine reach as many towns, cities, and countries as possible and we are always working to add new host church locations. Keep an eye on the location map on this page as we regularly add new locations.

If you attend or know of a church in your area that might be interested in serving as a host church, we encourage you to refer them HERE so that we can provide them with more information about becoming a host church.

If you attend Night to Shine at a local host church, and do not already have a church family, we encourage you to get involved there! We also invite you to join our Shine On community where you can access encouragement year-round!

Shine On, a ministry of the Tim Tebow Foundation, is a faith-based community â a source of inspiration, belonging, and education for everyone impacted by disability. Shine On envisions a global community of churches and families that foster belonging and purpose for all.

If you are a parent, caregiver, sibling, church, live with a disability or simply have a heart for people living with disability, we invite you to access hundreds of free resources available through Shine On covering a range of topics from key insights on disability and vision for pastors and leaders, to training, curriculum and support for the whole family all in one place. To access, visit www.shineon.org.

Thank you so much for your desire to support Night to Shine and celebrate people with special needs!

If you would like to donate to a specific Night to Shine event, please donate directly to the church hosting the event you would like to give to. To find a church in your area, please visit the Location Map on this page.

If you would like to give to the global movement of Night to Shine and support events worldwide through the Tim Tebow Foundation, please click HERE.

Thank you so much for your desire to support Night to Shine and celebrate people with special needs!

If you would like to donate dresses or other goods or services, please reach out directly to a Night to Shine host church in your area. To find a location near you, please view the Location Map on this page. The Tim Tebow Foundation is not able to accept physical donations of items such as dresses, formalwear, etc.
